refnamediv.refpurpose: Sort the entries by keys using a user-defined comparison function

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
callback
The callback comparison function.
Function callback should accept two parameters which will be filled by pairs of entry keys. The comparison function must return an integer less than, equal to, or greater than zero if the first argument is considered to be respectively less than, equal to, or greater than the second.
